ModMetaData.name: Diapers and Accidents
ModMetaData.author: Tyrell G.
ModMetaData.description: V0.2 This mod adds diapers, traits that work off the diapers, an ability to make diapers at the tailoring bench (Patchleather finally has a use!) and several other diaper-related things. Not gonna make you download this, but it's here if you want stuff like this.
